summary: Implements a Chebyshev spectral graph convolution layer for MXNet, using Chebyshev polynomial expansions of the normalized Laplacian to transform node features into higher‑level representations within graph neural networks.
business_intent: Provide an efficient, scalable MXNet‑based building block for graph neural network models that performs spectral filtering without costly eigen‑decomposition, enabling developers to apply advanced graph convolutions in deep learning applications.
